name: Catch the Colorshifter
description:
Made for  "8 Bits to Infinity - Mouse Jam 2", this is a small, top-down  puzzle game where you have to open and close the gates correctly to catch the colorshifter and was my first experience using Godot.

All assets where made by me, except the portal, which I got from here.

 

You are the white dot and need to prevent the colored dot from reaching the portal. The colored dot can change his color. He needs a certain number of turns to change it, indicated by the bubble above its head.

Controls:

Left click on a light blue tile: Move there

Left click a colored "button"(grey rectangles with colored circle in the middle): Open/Close gates of that color
